div1.head: IDL Definitions
div1.p: This appendix contains the complete OMG IDL for the Level 1 Document Object Model definitions. The definitions are divided into Core and HTML.
The IDL files are also available as: &w3c.url;/idl.zip

div2.head: Document Object Model Level 1 Core
div2.p: This section contains the OMG IDL definitions for the interfaces in the Core Document Object Model specification, including the extended (XML) interfaces.
